extendedInfo.description: Note: I have updated the app to remove a functionality which caused freezing up of the app. Thanks for the feedback, keep them coming!"Cool Facts Official" is an app for people who like facts, facts which are either funny or cool.All the facts in this app are funny, cool, informative, real and verifiable. The app comes with regular in-app updates from our facebook page, official website & twitter account whenever there is an update. So there is no end to the facts. Almost every day you will get new facts unlike many other cool facts apps. Also all of these facts are true as we are a team of people who care about the quality of our work. Most of the facts will be verifiable using wikipedia and other trusty websites like Nat Geo, Discovery etc.Features:* More than 4000 facts and new facts are getting added daily!* Swipe Left or Right for next or previous facts.* Random Fact & Latest Fact Buttons.* Twitter sharing button. Amaze your followers with awesome cool facts.* Links to our Facebook, Google Plus & Twitter pages and to the official website.* A never ending list of cool facts.* Option to report wrong/false facts.* A simple mode which will make all the buttons disappear.This is the official Coolfacts.in Android app. We're very happy to announce this app for all our android fans.We really hope you enjoy these facts and have a fun time. If you have any feedbacks or comments about the app, please feel free to contact me via the email id. If you have any complain about the app, please refrain from posting the comment here. Send it to my email id instead so that it won't go unnoticed. I will try to fix it asap.And finally please share this app with your friends and relatives.Check out more coolfacts at:Our Website: http://www.coolfacts.inFacebook page: http://www.facebook.com/coolfactG+ page: https://plus.google.com/116092984993611978225?rel=publisherTwitter Profile: http://www.twitter.com/coolfacts_fb

reviews.title: quality
reviews.comment: if you want thousands of quality facts then this is the app to download, well presented app full of thousands of great facts, brilliant stuff.
reviews.author: Jason Yates

reviews.title: Good ,Thanks
reviews.comment: If you can add search button ? and option to make the people upload there facts ?
reviews.author: Hashim AL-Safwani

reviews.title: It WAS good!
reviews.comment: Besides all the typos it was a pretty good app before the last update. Now the ad pop ups freeze up my phone and I have to power it down to remove them. Uninstalling!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome Facts
reviews.comment: Hi AWESOME TECH . Great job for the app.  Suggestions : after scrolling down on long facts , not able to read next/previous fact with out scrolling up.
reviews.author: Mithunm Madhavadas

reviews.title: super cool
reviews.comment: Cool way to get yourself updated
reviews.author: James Francis

reviews.title: its simply awesme
reviews.comment: simple interesting and easy... like ths app :)... works perfectly

reviews.title: Awesome app
reviews.comment: You should try it out. Its very informative and fun!
